item.description:
UZ will have our February 09 Monthly Meet Up to discuss;

Current National and Local Events

Conspiracies

Paranormal Issues

We will be at a Raw Food Cafe.
This will be a non-alcoholic and
Non Smoking event.

I will be getting coffee from the Dunkin Donuts down the
Road.

In the back ground there will be music.

Singing will be in the back room.
Please send me a listing of what songs that you want to sing
No later than February 18th. This will give our KJs a chance to
See if they have the songs and bring them to the Meet Up.
Our Members enjoyed doing Karaoke singing at our January Meet Up.

Conversations will be in the front of the Café if anyone
Would rather talk about current events than sing.
I will probably be going to the front of the Café to talk
To members about Current Events after a brief introduction
In the back room.

If you cannot attend, then give us your ideas, comments and questions
For us to discuss at the Meet Up.

We will give the results in a later Meet Up Trip Report.

This is a reminder memo a few days before this Meet Up.

Look At Me Now/Catch a Healthy Habit is across the
Street from the West Haven Green.

POC Lori Larsen
(203) 933-2200

You can either park on Campbell Ave or
On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony's Pizza Italian Restaurant.
There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony's.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to
Look at Me Now.

THIS EVENT WILL BE RESCHEDULED IF THERE IS BAD
WEATHER. LOCAL WEATHER REPORTS ARE PREDICTING
POSSIBLE SNOW FROM SATURDAY NIGHT INTO SUNDAY.
I WILL KEEP MY MEMBERS INFORMED.

http://www.lookatmeno...

www.lookatmenow22.com/

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

Organizer

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: The Cafe is small enough that someone can point me out.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone has Our February 2009 Monthly Meet Up on Feb 22
